channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on corner, 26th May
item.description:

item.title: Council paving slabs kicked up by tree roots next to one that has sunk, 26th May
item.description:

item.title: Entrance to Elmfield Park from Elmfield Road, 24th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Elmfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Sign Damaged - Yet Again!, 24th May
item.description:
The location is the crossroads at the junction of Cleeve Common Road, Whittington Road, and Aggs Hill / Cheltenham. This sign has JUST been repaired after 2 YEARS. It now seems the finger post has slid down the main post - see pictures. In addition, a finger post pointing in the Cheltenham direction has not been replaced during the recent repair and several drivers have ended up at Cleeve Common. Please can this sign be repaired again and hopefully it will last this time :-)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath and footpath signpost, 24th May
item.description:
